scripts.build: esbuild packages/static/src/*.ts --log-level=silent --outdir=packages/static/dist && esbuild packages/util/src/*.ts --log-level=silent --outdir=packages/util/dist && esbuild packages/external/src/*.ts --log-level=silent --outdir=packages/external/dist && esbuild packages/extension/src/*.ts --log-level=silent --outdir=packages/extension/dist && esbuild packages/util/src/*.ts --log-level=silent --outdir=packages/util/dist && esbuild packages/workspaces/src/*.ts --log-level=silent --outdir=packages/workspaces/dist && esbuild packages/extension/src/*.ts --log-level=silent --outdir=packages/extension/dist && tsm ./packages/cli/src/bin.ts build
